Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Today, I have come to inspect your cows. May
I?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seem to get along well.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you always treat your cows as if they were
your friends?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? It wants me to pet it?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_L>But I, er...I have never laid hands on a cow
before. I don't even know what to do.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, you've been forewarned, cow. If I end up
being a terrible petter, you'd better not bite me!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
H-hey now, that tickles!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>Hee hee! What a funny one. Are all cows this
amusing?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Erm! N-not that I think your cows are anything
but the most common of bovines, of course.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>However, I suppose they may be a teensy-
weensy bit cute.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I'm sure that's something that can be said of
all cows! It's not like yours are special in that
regard!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Though I'll concede that it was you who showed
me that cows can be more adorable than I had
previously thought.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So, I suppose I owe you my thanks. For that one
thing, anyway.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
A-anyway, I'm very busy as usual--places to go,
people to see--so I must be going! Good day,
<MYNAME>.
